about_the_game:
About the Game


DECONSTRUCTION is a fast-paced, hardcore, vertical shooting game.

Control a simple square and avoid bullets, beat the BOSS and challenge yourself.

How to Control


Keyboard

Move: ↑↓←→
Select: Mouse Left
Cancel: Mouse Right / Escape
Shoot: Ctrl

Gamepad (WIP)

Move: ↑↓←→
Shoot: A
Cancel: B

About the Demo


Hi there.

DECONSTRUCTION is my first formal game which targets on formal release, and you find its demo here.

But before you start play the demo, you should know:

* This demo is working in progress, it's not finished yet.
* This demo will keep update, more levels and some experimental ideas may appear on further update temporarily.
* I really read your comments, reviews, and looking forward to any of your feedback.

In fact I'm quite not sure what a game I'm creating because my lack of experience, and I'm not determinated what I'll deliver to you by this game.

In other words, at the current time, this game is totally a personal game created for me, use to explore myself and verify my thought.

You may love this game, or not.
But whatever, you're always welcome to give me any feedback.

By the way, English is not my native language and I'm learning it. I'm sorry if I made wrong.
